user_info.name: Mireu Lim
about: Hello :) I'm Mireu, a student developer who wants to change uncomfortable things creatively!
We are working on the project using Python and GoLang.
Currently, I am interested in AI, so I am preparing projects and papers on the theme of AI.

Dply.info_text: It is a program that allows you to deploy docker containers and view the status of containers on the web.
